PACKAGE_DESCRIPTION: A parser designed to interpret and extract data from JSON (.json) files, facilitating data interchange and manipulation in structured formats.
ADDITIONAL_REQUIREMENTS: Parse JSON data and convert it into Python dictionaries and lists.
Handle complex nested JSON structures and data types.
Support JSON schema validation and error reporting.
Allow integration with data processing pipelines for tasks like data transformation and storage.
Provide a complete implementation of all internal parsing methods.
Ensure robust error handling and logging within the parser.
